title: Gold III looking to join a ranked team
body:
Looking for a ranked team, hopefully consists of gold or higher (but willing to join lower tier) wanting to see how well i can do as a support in hopefully a decent team. Would also help if the team uses skype or team speak, im 20 years old not that it matters. willing to try out and wont cry if im not good enough to make the team. 

Can play pretty much all champions, but at the moment prefer Alistar and thresh. 
Can play other lanes also, but would rather play as support. 
Thanks for reading.

p.s message me in game if you have a team i can possibly join.
Ign: iiBarter

replies.body:
me too! banned until friday 07.11 but after that, down.

ign: nononotorious

gold 3

better than you!
Message me in game, we will see if we can sort something out once you're not banned, hopefully you're not a shit bloke/girl but.

im a fantastic guy irl.

in game, not so much. i tend to be a bit intolerant of  people who cant be taught. not a problem for you though, dw.
haha nah wasnt worried for me, i just dont want the other people on the team crying ;)
